org.apache.flex.utils

Class ExceptionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.utils.ExceptionUtil

  • public class ExceptionUtil
extends Object
    A utility for wrapping exceptions.

        public static String exceptionToString(Throwable t)
        Utility method for converting an exception into a string. This method unwinds all wrapped exceptions
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The printable exception
